option.name: content
option.value:
Do not return example code, do not use @author or @version or @since or @file tags. DO NOT generate example usage. DO NOT generate usage example. DO NOT use html tags such as

, ,

  • . DO NOT generate documentation for type member properties. If end of line comment, make it short, starting with //

task.summary: Default task
Initialize `swc` project with basic folder parsing functionality and Visual Studio configuration files.
Refactor project structure, add precompiled headers, introduce diagnostic system, and implement source file content loading.
Refactor diagnostic system, improve file handling, and streamline project structure.
Introduce logging system, refine diagnostics management, incorporate `CompilerContext`, and enhance file handling.
Simplify diagnostic formatting by embedding messages in `DiagReporter` and adjusting related API.
Add format validation for source files and enhance diagnostics system.
Refactor diagnostics system by introducing shorthand methods in `DiagReporter` and renaming diagnostic identifiers for clarity. Adjust source file error reporting to use new methods.
Refactor project structure by relocating `swc.cpp` to `src/Main` and updating Visual Studio project configuration.
Introduce `Lexer` component with tokenization support, integrate it with `SourceFile`, and update project configuration.
Refactor `Lexer` and `SourceFile` tokenization by introducing `CompilerContext::sourceFile`, simplifying tokenization API, and updating project configuration.
Update `.gitignore` to exclude `.idea/` directory for IDE compatibility

Refactor diagnostics system by introducing `DiagnosticElement` for improved error representation, embedding diagnostic messages in `DiagReporter`, and updating related APIs to enhance modularity and maintainability.
Refactor diagnostics system by replacing `DiagList.h` with `DiagIds.h`, embedding `DiagnosticId` enum directly, and updating includes and project configuration for simplicity and maintainability.
Refactor diagnostics system by renaming `DiagReporter` to `Reporter`, updating associated includes, and modifying code references to improve clarity and consistency.
Refactor `Reporter` by replacing `SWAG_DIAG` macro with `addError` method for improved maintainability and clarity. Update `initErrors` to use the new method.
Enhance diagnostics system by introducing location tracking in `DiagnosticElement`. Refactor `Lexer` and `SourceFile` to use `addError` with location data for improved error reporting.

Implement `SourceCodeLocation` structure to enhance error reporting with accurate line and column details. Refactor `Lexer` and `DiagnosticElement` to support location-aware diagnostics and improve logging with contextual information.

Refactor project structure by moving `Check` utilities to `Report` module, introducing `swagAssert` with platform-specific implementation, and replacing `Fs` with `fs` for standardized namespace consistency.
Fix `SWAG_ASSERT` condition in `SourceCodeLocation::fromOffset` and reorder member variables for clarity. Update task and configuration in `.idea/workspace.xml`.
Refactor diagnostics creation by replacing `Reporter::diagnostic` with `Diagnostic::instance` for improved encapsulation and consistency.
Replace `Diagnostic::instance` with direct instantiation for improved simplicity and remove unused factory method. Update related `Lexer` and `SourceFile` code for consistency.

Refactor `Lexer` by introducing token-specific attributes and methods for improved encapsulation. Enhance tokenization logic to support blank spaces, line breaks, and comments effectively. Update related classes (`SourceFile`, `Token`, `SourceCodeLocation`) for consistency.
Add UTF-8 decoding utility and reorder blank token handling in `Lexer`. Update project files to include new `Utf8` utility.

Refactor `SourceFile` methods to use `const` references for improved consistency. Integrate UTF-8 decoding in `SourceCodeLocation` column calculation and update project files to include `Utf8` utility.

Introduce `LangSpec` class and integrate it into `CompilerInstance`. Enhance UTF-8 utility to return structured output and improve tokenization by reordering blank handling logic. Update project and configuration files accordingly.

Introduce `Flags` and `EnumFlags` templates to encapsulate bitwise operations. Extend `LangSpec` with character flag utilities for `isBlank`, `isDigit`, `isLetter`, and `isAscii` checks. Update `Lexer` to use `LangSpec` for enhanced tokenization. Modify project files to include `Flags.h`.
Refactor `Lexer::tokenize` to improve buffer safety by adding bounds checking for comments. Update `.idea/workspace.xml` to reflect recent project changes.
Refactor `LangSpec` and `Lexer` to enhance blank space handling with UTF-8 support. Adjust related methods, types, and tokenization logic. Update project files and `.idea/workspace.xml`.

Refactor `Lexer::tokenize` by extracting handling of blank spaces, line breaks, and comments into dedicated methods. Adjust related logic for improved readability and maintainability. Update project files and `.idea/workspace.xml`.

Enhance `Lexer` with string literal parsing support. Detect unclosed strings and invalid EOL within literals. Update diagnostics system and related tokenization logic for improved error handling. Modify project files and `.idea/workspace.xml`.

Refactor `Lexer` parsing methods for enhanced encapsulation and consistency. Introduce instance variables for `Lexer` state, replace method parameters with member accesses, and return `Result` for improved error handling. Update `.idea/workspace.xml` accordingly.

Enhance `Lexer` with support for raw and multi-line string literals. Add sub-token identifiers for string literal types. Refactor tokenization logic to improve readability and maintainability. Update project files and `.idea/workspace.xml` accordingly.

Refactor `Lexer` EOL and string literal handling for improved robustness and readability. Add support for collapsing consecutive EOLs, escaping within multi-line strings, and detailed diagnostics for unclosed literals. Update project files and `.idea/workspace.xml`.
Refactor `Lexer` to delegate EOL and blank handling to `LangSpec`. Introduce `consumeOneEol` utility for consistent line tracking. Update `.idea/workspace.xml` and project files for related changes.
Simplify `consumeOneEol` logic in `Lexer` by refactoring EOL handling and consolidating line tracking.

Add support for hexadecimal and binary number literals in `Lexer`. Introduce `LangSpec` utilities for number parsing and validation, including separator and malformed number diagnostics. Update project files and `.idea/workspace.xml` for related changes.

MESSAGE.value: Refactor diagnostics system by replacing `DiagList.h` with `DiagIds.h`, embedding `DiagnosticId` enum directly, and updating includes and project configuration for simplicity and maintainability.
Refactor diagnostics system by renaming `DiagReporter` to `Reporter`, updating associated includes, and modifying code references to improve clarity and consistency.
Refactor `Reporter` by replacing `SWAG_DIAG` macro with `addError` method for improved maintainability and clarity. Update `initErrors` to use the new method.
Enhance diagnostics system by introducing location tracking in `DiagnosticElement`. Refactor `Lexer` and `SourceFile` to use `addError` with location data for improved error reporting.

Implement `SourceCodeLocation` structure to enhance error reporting with accurate line and column details. Refactor `Lexer` and `DiagnosticElement` to support location-aware diagnostics and improve logging with contextual information.

Refactor project structure by moving `Check` utilities to `Report` module, introducing `swagAssert` with platform-specific implementation, and replacing `Fs` with `fs` for standardized namespace consistency.
Fix `SWAG_ASSERT` condition in `SourceCodeLocation::fromOffset` and reorder member variables for clarity. Update task and configuration in `.idea/workspace.xml`.
Refactor diagnostics creation by replacing `Reporter::diagnostic` with `Diagnostic::instance` for improved encapsulation and consistency.
Replace `Diagnostic::instance` with direct instantiation for improved simplicity and remove unused factory method. Update related `Lexer` and `SourceFile` code for consistency.

Refactor `Lexer` by introducing token-specific attributes and methods for improved encapsulation. Enhance tokenization logic to support blank spaces, line breaks, and comments effectively. Update related classes (`SourceFile`, `Token`, `SourceCodeLocation`) for consistency.
Add UTF-8 decoding utility and reorder blank token handling in `Lexer`. Update project files to include new `Utf8` utility.

Refactor `SourceFile` methods to use `const` references for improved consistency. Integrate UTF-8 decoding in `SourceCodeLocation` column calculation and update project files to include `Utf8` utility.

Introduce `LangSpec` class and integrate it into `CompilerInstance`. Enhance UTF-8 utility to return structured output and improve tokenization by reordering blank handling logic. Update project and configuration files accordingly.

Introduce `Flags` and `EnumFlags` templates to encapsulate bitwise operations. Extend `LangSpec` with character flag utilities for `isBlank`, `isDigit`, `isLetter`, and `isAscii` checks. Update `Lexer` to use `LangSpec` for enhanced tokenization. Modify project files to include `Flags.h`.
Refactor `Lexer::tokenize` to improve buffer safety by adding bounds checking for comments. Update `.idea/workspace.xml` to reflect recent project changes.
fix
Refactor `LangSpec` and `Lexer` to enhance blank space handling with UTF-8 support. Adjust related methods, types, and tokenization logic. Update project files and `.idea/workspace.xml`.

Refactor `Lexer::tokenize` by extracting handling of blank spaces, line breaks, and comments into dedicated methods. Adjust related logic for improved readability and maintainability. Update project files and `.idea/workspace.xml`.

Enhance `Lexer` with string literal parsing support. Detect unclosed strings and invalid EOL within literals. Update diagnostics system and related tokenization logic for improved error handling. Modify project files and `.idea/workspace.xml`.

Refactor `Lexer` parsing methods for enhanced encapsulation and consistency. Introduce instance variables for `Lexer` state, replace method parameters with member accesses, and return `Result` for improved error handling. Update `.idea/workspace.xml` accordingly.

Enhance `Lexer` with support for raw and multi-line string literals. Add sub-token identifiers for string literal types. Refactor tokenization logic to improve readability and maintainability. Update project files and `.idea/workspace.xml` accordingly.

Refactor `Lexer` EOL and string literal handling for improved robustness and readability. Add support for collapsing consecutive EOLs, escaping within multi-line strings, and detailed diagnostics for unclosed literals. Update project files and `.idea/workspace.xml`.
Refactor `Lexer` to delegate EOL and blank handling to `LangSpec`. Introduce `consumeOneEol` utility for consistent line tracking. Update `.idea/workspace.xml` and project files for related changes.
Simplify `consumeOneEol` logic in `Lexer` by refactoring EOL handling and consolidating line tracking.

Add support for hexadecimal and binary number literals in `Lexer`. Introduce `LangSpec` utilities for number parsing and validation, including separator and malformed number diagnostics. Update project files and `.idea/workspace.xml` for related changes.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Add support for hexadecimal and binary number literals in `Lexer`. Introduce `LangSpec` utilities for number parsing and validation, including separator and malformed number diagnostics. Update project files and `.idea/workspace.xml` for related changes.
